pages.text: $(thing)Reaction crafting/$ gives a way to create more components like $(l:basic/conduit#craft)Conduits/$ and $(l:basic/condenser#craft)Condensers/$, as well as portable elements in the form of $(l:basic/shard#craft)Shards/$

To start $(thing)reaction crafting/$, make an $(thing)air/$+$(thing)earth/$ or $(thing)fire/$+$(thing)water/$ reaction in the catalyst, and a magic circle will appear. The rate it spins depends on how much $(thing)charge/$ it has. More reactions will give it more $(thing)charge/$, but the higher the $(thing)charge/$, the quicker it will decay. Higher tier recipes will require more $(thing)charge/$, and you will find you may need more advanced setups.
